Package com.example.finding_tory

package com.example.finding_tory
  • Class
    Description
    ActivityCodes
    Enum representing various activity request codes used in the application.
    Barcode
    Represents the data that is associated with a barcode such as description, make, model, and cost.
    BulkTagFragment
     
    BulkTagFragment.TagDialogListener
    Interface for communicating the dialog actions to the parent context.
    CaptureAct
    Capture activity that allows barcode to be scanned
    DatePickerFragment
    This class is responsible for creating the date picker dialog
    DeleteConfirmationFragment
    DeleteConfirmationFragment is a DialogFragment subclass used for confirming item deletion in the application.
    DeleteConfirmationFragment.DeleteDialogListener
    Interface for communicating the dialog actions to the parent context.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    Filter
    The Filter class represents a filtering mechanism for data.
    FilterFragment
    This fragment provides a user interface to filter data based on specified criteria such as date range, description, and make.
    FilterFragment.FilterDialogListener
     
    FirestoreDB
    FirestoreDB is a utility class that provides access to Firebase Firestore database instances and references.

    ImageAdapter.OnDeleteButtonClickListener
     
    InternalStorageManager
    A class for managing internal storage operations in an Android application.
    Inventory
    Represents an inventory containing a collection of items.
    InventoryAdapter
    Implements adapter functionality in order to link the InventoryViewActivity's ListView element to the array of Items in an Inventory.
    InventoryTest
     
    InventoryUITest
     
    InventoryViewActivity
    Displays the content of a given Inventory (ie.
    Item
    Represents an item with various attributes such as purchase date, description, make, model, serial number, estimated value, comments, and tags.
    ItemTest
     
    ItemViewActivity
    ItemViewActivity is an AppCompatActivity that displays detailed information about a selected item.
    Ledger
     
    LedgerAdapter
    Implements adapter functionality in order to link the LedgerFragment's ListView element to the array of Inventories in a Ledger.
    LedgerViewActivity
    LedgerViewActivity is an AppCompatActivity that manages the main user interface for the application.
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity is an AppCompatActivity that provides a user interface for login and new account registration.
    RegisterActivity
    RegisterActivity is an AppCompatActivity that provides a user interface for new account registration.
    Sort
    The Sort class represents sorting parameters.
    SortItemFragment
    SortItemFragment is a DialogFragment that allows users to choose sorting criteria.
    SortItemFragment.SortDialogListener
    The interface for event handling from the SortItemFragment.
    TagAdapter
    TagAdapter is a custom adapter for a RecyclerView that displays a list of tags.
    TagAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for the TagAdapter.
    TestBarcodeContainer
    A container class to hold barcodes that will be used for testing
    UpsertInventoryViewActivity
    Activity for creating an inventory.
    UpsertViewActivity
    This class is responsible for updating/inserting items in an inventory
    User
    Represents a user with a username, name, password, and a list of inventories.
